level.heading: Thimbles.
level.text: ยง 27-894 Thimbles. (a) When passing through combustible constructions, bent connectors constructed of type B gas vent material shall be installed so that the clearances required by the standard are maintained. (b) Vent connections made of single-wall metal pipe shall not pass through any combustible walls or partitions unless they are guarded at the point of passage by ventilated metal thimbles not smaller than the following: (1) For equipment conforming to standards -- four inches larger in diameter than the vent connector. (2) For equipment having draft hoods -- six inches larger in diameter than the vent connector. (3) For equipment without draft hoods -- twelve inches larger in diameter than the vent connector.
